brand: [], search: "" }); const [productsList, setProductsList] = useState(products); // FILTER PRODUCTS BY SIZE const filterBySize = (size) => { setFilter({ ...filter, size: size }); const filteredProducts = products.filter(product => { return product.size.includes(size); }); setProductsList(filteredProducts); } return (
